type.description:
### ⚠️ Requires [Extra Origins](https://github.com/MoriyaShiine/extra-origins/wiki) to be installed! ⚠️

Allows actions to be run from an in game menu, up to four directions (`up`, `down`, `left`, `right`).
type.markdownDescription:
### ⚠️ Requires [Extra Origins](https://github.com/MoriyaShiine/extra-origins/wiki) to be installed! ⚠️

Allows actions to be run from an in game menu, up to four directions (`up`, `down`, `left`, `right`).

key.description: The key used to open the radial menu.
key.markdownDescription: The key used to open the radial menu.

sprite_location.description: The sprite to use for the radial menu.
sprite_location.markdownDescription: The sprite to use for the radial menu.

up_action.description: An [Entity Action Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_action_types) to be executed when the `up` option is selected.
up_action.markdownDescription: An [Entity Action Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_action_types) to be executed when the `up` option is selected.

down_action.description: An [Entity Action Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_action_types) to be executed when the `down` option is selected.
down_action.markdownDescription: An [Entity Action Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_action_types) to be executed when the `down` option is selected.

left_action.description: An [Entity Action Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_action_types) to be executed when the `left` option is selected.
left_action.markdownDescription: An [Entity Action Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_action_types) to be executed when the `left` option is selected.

right_action.description: An [Entity Action Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_action_types) to be executed when the `right` option is selected.
right_action.markdownDescription: An [Entity Action Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_action_types) to be executed when the `right` option is selected.

lost_action.description: An [Entity Action Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_action_types) to be executed when this power is removed from the entity.
lost_action.markdownDescription: An [Entity Action Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_action_types) to be executed when this power is removed from the entity.

swap_time.description: The time it takes to swap between the different radial menu options.
swap_time.markdownDescription: The time it takes to swap between the different radial menu options.

default_direction.description: The default direction the radial menu will open in.
default_direction.markdownDescription: The default direction the radial menu will open in.
